summary: The Contoso Wireless product phone is a powerful and advanced device that features a sleek design, a powerful octa-core processor, up to 15 hours of talk time, 16MP rear camera and 8MP front camera, facial recognition, fingerprint scanning, encrypted data storage, and preloaded popular apps. The product phone also has an intuitive user interface and regular software updates for added security. Customers who have any further questions or need assistance setting up their device can contact Contoso Wireless anytime.
